"use client" import { useState } from "react"; import "./Login.css"; export const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: "", password: "", }) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() // Backend integration point console.log("Login Data:", formData) // Send to backend API } return (
